pullrequest.title: added joint_command_gui tool - not sure where it should live

content.raw:
Sorry, I didn't know where this would go within the repo - so I just thought id add it here and whoever is in charge of the other python tutuorial would properly integrate it. Below is the manifest file it needs - nothing much to it.


```
#!c++



<package>
  <description brief="joint_command_gui">
     joint_command_gui - control atlas robot using a wx gui.
  </description>
  <author>Maurice Fallon</author>
  <license>BSD</license>
  <review status="unreviewed" notes=""/>
  <url>http://ros.org/wiki/tutorial_atlas_control</url>
  <depend package="osrf_msgs"/>

</package>

```
content.html:
Sorry, I didn't know where this would go within the repo - so I just thought id add it here and whoever is in charge of the other python tutuorial would properly integrate it. Below is the manifest file it needs - nothing much to it.

<package>
  <description brief="joint_command_gui">
     joint_command_gui - control atlas robot using a wx gui.
  </description>
  <author>Maurice Fallon</author>

  <url>http://ros.org/wiki/tutorial_atlas_control</url>

</package>
